children.content:
{
  "compilerOptions": {
    "target": "ES2022",
    "module": "ESNext",
    "lib": ["ES2022"],
    "outDir": "./dist",
    "rootDir": "./",
    "strict": true,
    "esModuleInterop": true,
    "allowSyntheticDefaultImports": true,
    "skipLibCheck": true,
    "forceConsistentCasingInFileNames": true,
    "resolveJsonModule": true,
    "declaration": false,
    "removeComments": true,
    "noImplicitAny": false,
    "strictNullChecks": true,
    "strictFunctionTypes": true,
    "noImplicitThis": true,
    "noImplicitReturns": false,
    "noFallthroughCasesInSwitch": true,
    "moduleResolution": "node",
    "allowJs": true,
    "checkJs": false,
    "isolatedModules": true
  },
  "ts-node": {
    "esm": true
  },
  "include": [
    "**/*.ts"
  ],
  "exclude": [
    "node_modules",
    "dist"
  ]
}
